subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Penguins, ousted by the lower-seeded Rangers in the playoffs last season, are knifing through the regular season again and aiming toward a rematch Tuesday at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: The Penguins, ousted by the lower-seeded Rangers in the playoffs last season, are knifing through the regular season again and aiming toward a rematch Tuesday at Madison Square Garden.
